div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1200 Caria?, c. 1925 (256) Burial: c. 394 B.C. (Cahn) Contents: 12+ AR Cnidus: dr. Disposition: London 11; Oxford 1 Hill, NC 1927, pp. 202 f. Cahn, Knidos, pp. 3 f. Noe 256 combines these coins with a third century hd. See no. 1344 below
